<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataLC extends data { const CODE = 'LC'; const PREFIX = 1; const REGION = 'North America'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:[58]\d\d|758|900)\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '758(?:4(?:30|5\d|6[2-9]|8[0-2])|57[0-2]|638)\d{4}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '758(?:28[4-7]|384|4(?:6[01]|8[4-9])|5(?:1[89]|20|84)|7(?:1[2-9]|2\d|3[01]))\d{4}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '8(?:00|33|44|55|66|77|88)[2-9]\d{6}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '900[2-9]\d{6}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '5(?:00|2[12]|33|44|66|77|88)[2-9]\d{6}'=>array( 'personal_number', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1-$2', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1-$2-$3', ); }
